item.title: Sony Bravia KDL-32M3000 comments: 2 weeks later
item.description: Two weeks after purchasing a Sony Bravia KDL-32M3000, I've got a couple of things that I wish this model had. [slnet0514:e90698e4-ca6e-4362-9b21-5284d5257fdd]

item.title: My new television, the Sony Bravia
item.description: Today, I purchased a new television, a Sony Bravia flat-panel LCD (the KDL-32M3000, which is a 32" model).
